#cloud-config
users:
  - name: ubuntu
    groups: sudo
    shell: /bin/bash
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  reentim@gmail.com

locale: en_AU.UTF-8

packages:
  - make
  - nginx
  - direnv

snap:
  - commands:
    - ['install', 'ruby', '--classic']

runcmd:
  - whoami >> /home/ubuntu/whoami.log
  - gem install bundler
  - git clone https://github.com/reentim/ptv_flinders_st.git
  - cd /home/ubuntu/ptv_flinders_st && bundle install
